intro: Leptotes vellozicola, commonly known as the velvetleaf, is a species of flowering plant in the family Malvaceae. The plant produces small, clustered flowers that are typically pale green to yellow in color. It is native to tropical and subtropical regions of the Americas and is often found in moist, disturbed habitats. Leptotes vellozicola is known for its adaptability and is sometimes considered an invasive species in certain areas.
